description: Create eBooks with Automateed, your ideal AI eBook creator. Use AI to speed up your writing and content process. Design e-books with no.1. generator.
title: Ai Ebook Generator | Leadmagnet & eBook Creator
introduction: Automateed AI offers a comprehensive suite of tools designed to assist in the creation and promotion of eBooks, novels, and online courses. These tools help users generate ideas, titles, outlines, summaries, and more, making the process of writing and marketing books and courses more efficient and effective.
targetPeople: Authors, marketers, educators, and content creators looking to streamline the process of creating and promoting eBooks, novels, and online courses.

faqs.question: Are books unique?
faqs.answer: Books are completely unique and completely yours. Tested algorithm over 50 times and every single time showed uniqueness in copyscape and different antiplagiarism checkers.

faqs.question: Can I Publish a Book Written by AI?
faqs.answer: Of course you can publish a book written by AI. There are no platforms that prohibit AI eBooks, and what’s more, there are no AI detectors that can magically if the book was written by AI. Especially with out advanced algorithm that makes every book sound like written by a professional (human) writer.

faqs.question: Can I use AI to Create a Book?
faqs.answer: Not only that you can use it to write a book, but it’s advisable. AI is here to stay, and only marketers that stay up to date will be on top. AI is not here to take your ebook business, or any other – it’s here to improve it.

faqs.question: What are my payment options?
faqs.answer: We accept major credit cards, including Visa and Mastercard, through Stripe. We also accept PayPal!

faqs.question: Which devices support Automateed AI?
faqs.answer: Whether you’re on a desktop, laptop, tablet, or mobile phone, if it connects to the internet, it’s compatible with Automateed AI. Our tool is optimized for all devices for a smooth user experience. But you will need a stable internet connection in order to use it.

faqs.question: Will I benefit from future updates and new features?
faqs.answer: Yes! Your subscription ensures you have access to all new features and tools we roll out. We’re constantly innovating, aiming to provide tools that make your business operations more efficient.

faqs.question: How does Automateed AI ensure data security?
faqs.answer: Data security is our top priority. All interactions on our tool are encrypted, and we adhere to stringent data protection standards. Rest assured, your data is in safe hands.

faqs.question: How does Automateed AI stand out from other AI platforms?
faqs.answer: Beyond functionality, Automateed AI emphasizes user experience. Our commitment is to make AI not just powerful but also user-friendly. Continuous updates based on user feedback ensure our website remains at the forefront of AI utility.

faqs.question: Can AI Write a Novel?
faqs.answer: Yes, Automateed AI can be used to write a novel. So you can not only use AI to write a book (informational/educational), but novels as well. It will tell stories with plot twists and interesting endings that you never expected from AI written novel.

faqs.question: How to Write a Book With AI?
faqs.answer: The process is quite simple. You are not expected to do more than a few clicks. Click on “create ebook” button, then select either a book or a novel, put in your title, target audience and the style of writing, and hit “generate outline”. Once you approve the outline, click on “start writing a book” and wait for a couple of minutes. Once done, you can edit the book, export it in PDF and WordDoc, along with images and book cover.

faqs.question: Can anyone use Automateed AI, even without tech experience?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! If you’re familiar with sending an email or writing a text, you’ll find Automateed AI intuitive. Think of it as a virtual colleague who’s available around the clock, always ready to assist without a hint of fatigue.

faqs.question: How can I test out Automateed AI?
faqs.answer: We believe in our product and want you to experience its benefits firsthand. Sign up for a trial. A free trial for all new users to explore the software. You get a preview of ebook written, for free!

faqs.question: Do I need to add credits or label books?
faqs.answer: Books are completely yours. You don’t have to add any labeling or credits to our software. The entire content of the book is fully yours.

faqs.question: Can I edit the book using Automateed?
faqs.answer: Definitely. We have an ebook editor where you can turn your content into beautifully designed ebook with breeze. Its intuitive and simple layout will streamline your publishing process!
